title: british chambers logo
content:
Hi all,

I was wondering what type was used for the british chambers logo:

[http://i276.photobucket.com/albums/kk25/leewilson78/logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023071841/http:/i276.photobucket.com/albums/kk25/leewilson78/logo.gif "http://i276.photobucket.com/albums/kk25/leewilson78/logo.gif")

Thanks
author: reboot

comments.content: Have a better look at it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023071841/http:/www.shinntype.com/).
Excellent, why the wow, do you know him?

does your gifted eye know which weight was used?

Thanks

_why the wow, do you know him?_

He’s a fellow typophile. And I’m a fan.

_does your gifted eye know which weight was used?_

Regular, I’d say.
Thanks Jan, I'm a fan now too :)
The wow also because I think this is the first time Beaufort showed up for here on the Type ID Board.
